entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
